text:
@realDonaldTrump A professionally produced campaign ad is no match for Biden's heartfelt condolences yesterday for coronavirus victims.

MOST Americans simply don't want a sociopath as their president during a pandemic. No campaign ad will change that. You don't stand a chance in November.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
